stage.openCarModelsQuery:
select * from tblassetmaster am 
inner join tblCarModel tc On am.ModelID = tc.modelID
where tc.CarGroup like '%tank%' and
am.carmark='TILX' and am.status=3 and 
am.acctId = 1686 and
not exists ( select 1 from tblProjectAsset pa where pa.AssetID=am.AssetID and pa.Complete=0)
and not exists ( select 1 from tblShopIncident si where si.AssetID=am.AssetID and si.RepairStatus <>46)
stage.queryForAssetsInProject: select *  from tblassetmaster am where am.ModelID=1805 and am.carmark='TILX' and am.status=3 and exists ( select 1 from tblProjectAsset pa where pa.AssetID=am.AssetID and pa.Complete=0) and not exists ( select 1 from tblShopIncident si where si.AssetID=am.AssetID and si.RepairStatus <>46)
stage.getCarsForStoragePortal: select *  from [dbo].[tblTAS_AssetLocation] where TASLocStatus = 'Arrived at Storage' and Consignee like 'BMT CONSULTING GROUP' and destination = 'PALESTINE, TX'
stage.gapRidersComplianceCars:
select am.AssetID,am.CarMark,am.CarNumber
from tblRiderXAsset r
join tblAssetMaster am on r.AssetID=am.AssetID and  am.CarMark='TILX' 
where RiderGroupID=24157
and RGECDate is null
stage.dueForTerminationComplianceCars:
select am.AssetID,am.CarMark,am.CarNumber
from tblAssetMaster am 
where SubStatusID=7 and am.CarMark='TILX' --Due For Termination
stage.getCarsForComplianceValidations:
Select * from tblTestResults tr
join tblAssetMaster am on tr.AssetID = am.AssetID
where tr.TestID = 82
AND am.CarMark = 'TILX' --AND am.CarNumber = 600121
AND tr.Recent = 1
AND tr.NextTestDate < = CONCAT(YEAR(GETDATE())+1,'-12-31')
AND tr.NextTestDate > = CONCAT(YEAR(GETDATE()),'-01-01')
